snippet.title: Portal Fantasy Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2464460/Portal_Fantasy/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=profile&utm_campaign=officiallaunchtrailer2025&utm_id=wishlists

Portal Fantasy is a creature capturing RPG full of nostalgia releasing April 16th, 2025 on Steam!

It has been 2000 years since the War of the Goddesses - Ravenna is dead, and the Pyli Kingdom has become prosperous once more. Or so it seems...Porbles, the ancient magical beings which inhabit the Wilderness, have suddenly turned on humans. The Portals to Earth are open again. Whispers of the Great Magus Atlantes are on everyone's lips. In this world, it is up to the Heroes and Architects to save the kingdom and solve its mysteries.

ABOUT THE GAME
Portal Fantasy is a pixel adventure RPG game driven by an epic story arc. From the moment gameplay begins, you’ll adventure as the hero on their way through the Porble Academy. Capture creatures and uncover the mysteries of the Pyli Kingdom. 


------------------------------­----
Follow Portal Fantasy for more!
------------------------------­----

Website: https://portalfantasy.io
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/portalfantasy
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@portalfantasyio
BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/portalfantasy.bsky.social
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/portalfantasy.io/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/portalfantasygame
